'''Notes'''
This definitely recommended laptop to run with Ubuntu. Tested with 2.6.35-28-generic #49-Ubuntu SMP Tue Mar 1 14:40:58 UTC 2011 i686 GNU/Linux. Everything works out of the box including web cam, wifi, 3D graphic, and most hardware key without any additional drivers. The only think I couldn't test is HDMI output.
